messages.subject: Re: [samuraihistory] Request

carl rosian <ghostweasel2k@...> wrote:
hi,
my name is carl.i live in cleveland ,ohio.ive been studying traditional japanese martial arts fer quite awhile now.id be interested.ive bee actively studying aikido,toshindo,&budo taijutsu fer over 8 yrs.contact me via email if youd like.my email address is undeadhuntyr@... . hope to hear from you.best regards,
kage no musha


gingerdarbini <darbyk@...> wrote:

I work at a high school and I am trying to find someone who would be
willing to be interviewed by a high school student by phone for about
20 minutes. The student is taking a class which he studies the topic
of his choice for the entire school year. One of the assignments is
to interview someone knowledgeable about the topic. He is studying
the lifestyles and ways of the samurai and ninja and their effect on
the feudal history of Japan.

Is anyone interested in this request? Thanks!
